Title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
Description: A young adolescent is adopted by a new family and he adventures with his Uncle Heck around the Kiwi mountains

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: Adventure film is a genre that revolves around the conquests and explorations of a protagonist. The purpose of the conquest can be to retrieve a person or treasure, but often the main focus is simply the pursuit of the unknown. - thescriptlab.com

Director.Name: Taika Waititi
Director.Bio: A New Zealand filmmaker, actor, and comedian

Title: Roman Holiday
Description: A young royal finds herself lost on the streets of Rome pretending to be someone else. A journalist with his own plans decides to help her without either of them revealing their identities.

Genre.Name: Romantic Comedy
Genre.Description: Romantic comedy is a subgenre of comedy and slice of life fiction, focusing on lighthearted, humorous plot lines centered on romantic ideas, such as how true love is able to surmount most obstacles. - Wikipedia.org

Director.Name: William Wyler
Director.Bio: A Swiss-German-American film director and producer

Title: The Parent Trap
Description: Adolescent twins are separated at a very young age by their parent’s divorce. Both girls reunite by happenstance and work to try to get their parents back together.

Genre.Name: Romantic Comedy
Genre.Description: Romantic comedy is a subgenre of comedy and slice of life fiction, focusing on lighthearted, humorous plot lines centered on romantic ideas, such as how true love is able to surmount most obstacles. - Wikipedia.org

Title: Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
Description: Four high school friends are set to spend their summer apart, when they find a pair of jeans that fits all of them. They share the jeans among them and share their adventures along the way.

Title: Emperor's New Groove
Description: A greedy emperor is turned into a llama by his jealous advisor. He journeys accross his kingdom with a not so please subject to this solution, but instead finds his redemption.

Genre.Name: Animation
Genre.Description: A film that has been made from animated character and realities

Title: Thor Ragnarok
Description: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela. - imdb.come

Director.Name: Taika Waititi
Director.Bio: Taika is a Kiwi Director who stars as a comedic character in a lot of his movies

Title: The Little Mermaid
Description: A mermaid princess is turned into a human by a sea witch. She must find a human to fall in love with her and kiss her before her time as a human runs out.

Genre.Name: Animation
Genre.Description: A film that has been made from animated character and realities

Title: Ocean's Eleven
Description: After being let ouf of prison on parole, Danny Ocean recruits a group of eleven to pull off a casino heist in Las Vegas

Title: Romancing the Stone
Description: A romanitc novelist who is apprehensive about living in the real world is tasked with rescuing her sister in Columbia. She is taken on a wild adventure living the life written on the pages of her books.

Title: Crazy Rich Asians
Description: Nick Young and his girlfriend Rachel Chu to to visit Nick’s parents in Singapore where Rachel learns that her boyfriend’s family is very rich. Rachel must prove to Nick’s family that she has what it takes to join their family.

Genre.Name: Romantic Comedy
Genre.Description: Romantic comedy is a subgenre of comedy and slice of life fiction, focusing on lighthearted, humorous plot lines centered on romantic ideas, such as how true love is able to surmount most obstacles. - Wikipedia.org
